Some Lesser Known Facts About Anna Eberstein

Does Anna Eberstein smoke?: Not Known

Does Anna Eberstein drink alcohol?: Yes

She was born in a family of Law descent. Her father and mother were both judges.

She grew up along her brother Christian.

She did her graduation from Oxford Brookes University in English Literature and Political Science.

From 1999-2003, she did her masters from Uppsala University. Along with her masters, she completed her business degree from Lincoln Memorial University.

In 2008, she joined ESPN as an ‘On-air promotions coordinator’.

She became quite famous after reports of her dating Hollywood actor Hugh Grant surfaced worldwide.

She was a retail director in a bar when she met her husband and Hollywood star Hugh Grant for the first time.

She gave birth to her first child, John Mungo with her boyfriend (now husband) Hugh Grant in September 2012.

In 2013, she started working as a freelance creative producer.

In December 2015, she and Hugh Grant welcomed their second child; their first daughter.

In March 2018, the couple were blessed with their third child.

On 25 May 2018, the couple got married in a small ceremony in West-London.

She is a trained Tennis player and often plays it in her leisure time.

She is the director and co-founder of the apparel and fashion company “Ace&Me” based in London.
